title: How to know which product is going to be the next trending and popular if I am attending a big expo - Quora

response.answer_text: You don’t. No-one does. All trade is a gamble. You speculate on goods, and hope to sell them at a profit. That doesn’t have to mean trying ot only deal in the next big thing. You can get very rich doing that sometimes, or you can get it seriously wrong, because that’s where the biggest competition is, and which results in cutthroat margins. You need to know at least as much about your customers as the products you intend to sell them. And keep an eye out for both novelty and quality that will appeal to them. You may be a lot better off shifting a thousand items with a £60 markup than fifty thousand on which you can only make £1. You aren’t looking for the next big thing, you are looking for your next big thing (which might not be very different from your last big thing)

Are you ONLY interested in what is “trending and popular?” Do you have ANY sense of what YOU YOURSELF like or just what OTHER PEOPLE like, allowing THEM to make YOUR PERSONAL DECISIONS FOR YOU ABOUT WHO YOU ARE? Is ANYTHING about you ORIGINAL or is your entire existence an amalgamation and synthesis of OTHER PEOPLE? You need to spend your time developing some ORIGINALITY!
